overview_of_class: Projects typically include a multi-scale simulation aspect and some preliminary theoretical concepts on the expected observations. There will be one midterm project and one final project. Topics of midterm project is nanowire. Topics for the final project: students will have the opportunity to apply the concepts that they have learned in class to a research problem of their own interest.
name: Multi-scale Modeling and Simulation in Solid Mechanics
subject: MECH_ENG
